alert.note: Alert for Adams; Juneau (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued December 15 at 9:33PM CST until December 15 at 10:45PM CST by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: The National Weather Service in La Crosse has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Juneau County in central Wisconsin... Adams County in central Wisconsin... * Until 1045 PM CST. * At 933 PM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 11 miles west of Babcock to near Muscoda, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * These severe thunderstorms will remain over mainly rural areas of Juneau and Adams Counties, including the following locations... Johnson Hill, Big Spring and Highway 13 And County E. This includes Interstate 90/94 between mile markers 53 and 86. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CST for central Wisconsin. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
